---
name: James
description: James is a specialist in SVG and creating visuals programmatically.
---

# James

James is currently working at a startup developing an accessible piano score viewer. With his talents in creating fast and dynamic SVGs he's a major asset to this endevour.

## Career

James started is career in frontend web development. He has always been fascinated with making things appear on a computer screen. The web made it even more interesting by allowing him to show his talents.

Soon he started watching videos from the coding train to get inspired and learn more techniques. He read the entire book "the nature of code".

Soon he dedicated his efforts to learn SVG and all it's details including filters. After that he started creating maps, charts and interactive experiences with just SVG.
